original_text:
Asgard
Informazioni generali
Software: Pragmatic Play
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 25
Importo minimo della puntata: 0,01 €
Importo massimo della puntata: 125 €
Valore minimo del gettone: 0,01 €
Valore massimo del gettone: 0,5 €
Numero di gettoni per linea: da 1 a 10
Return to Player (RTP): 96,48%
Volatilità: media
Caratteristiche principali
Questa slot machine della software house Pragmatic Play è stata lanciata online nel giugno del 2018 e si ispira al mondo delle leggende nordiche, con tanto di divinità e vichinghi.
Il tema è senza dubbio affascinante e anche al passo con i tempi, visto che negli ultimi anni alcuni film colossal di Hollywood hanno riportato in auge le vicende delle leggendarie popolazioni del nord Europa, tra cui quelle ambientate nell’immaginario regno di Asgard.
Per quanto riguarda la grafica, ci ha abbastanza sorpreso: un tema del genere lascia molto spazio a immagini spettacolari e realistiche, effetti speciali e animazioni 3D, invece la scelta dello sviluppatore è ricaduta su una grafica essenziale addirittura in stile anni ’80, in cui i personaggi ricordano da vicino i protagonisti delle serie della Marvel.
Per quanto riguarda il gameplay, non si tratta di un gioco particolarmente articolato ma anzi, risulta intuitivo e di facile approccio, consigliato quindi anche a coloro che non sono esperti di slot machine. In linea con gli altri giochi della Pragmatic Play, anche in Asgard il Return To Player (RTP) si attesta sul tradizionale 96% circa mentre la volatilità di questa slot è media, il che significa che le vincite sono abbastanza frequenti e c’è la possibilità anche di ottenere dei premi di un certo valore.
Simboli, Wild e Scatter in Asgard
I simboli di questa slot machine, come quasi sempre accade, vanno distinti in tematici e non tematici: questi ultimi sono rappresentati dalle carte da gioco, in questo caso solo dal J all’Asso, mentre quelli a tema sono un vero e proprio tributo alle leggende nordiche.
Ad alternarsi sui rulli troviamo infatti tutti i principali protagonisti di tali leggende, da Thor a Loki, da Odino a Freya, per quanto riguarda i simboli regolari, mentre quelli speciali sono il Wild, rappresentato dalla città di Asgard stessa e lo Scatter, o Bonus Symbol.
Il Wild ha funzione di Jolly e aiuta a completare delle combinazioni vincenti sostituendo gli altri simboli, mentre lo Scatter, in questo caso una maschera raffigurante una testa alata, attiva il gioco bonus e raddoppia le vincite.
Le funzionalità speciali
Asgard presenta diverse funzionalità speciali, che arricchiscono il gameplay e permettono di incrementare le possibilità di vincita.

Una funzione Free Spin viene attivata in maniera casuale e permette di accedere ai giochi bonus.
Wild impilati: durante il gioco regolare alcuni simboli si trasformano in Wild impilati (Stacked), aumentando le potenziali combinazioni vincenti.
Pioggia di Wild: in questo caso sui rulli compaiono dei simboli Wild che incrementano le opportunità di ottenere dei premi.

È possibile scoprire tutti i trucchi di Asgard giocando in modalità play for fun prima di iniziare a scommettere dei soldi veri!

raw_translation.response: Asgard is a slot game developed by Pragmatic Play that draws inspiration from the world of Norse legends, complete with gods and Vikings. The theme is both captivating and current, especially with recent Hollywood movies bringing back the legendary populations of Northern Europe. The graphics are surprisingly simple, reminiscent of the 80s and featuring characters that closely resemble Marvel superheroes. The gameplay, however, is intuitive and easy to approach, making it suitable for players of all experience levels. Asgard offers a Return to Player (RTP) of approximately 96% and a medium volatility, which means that wins are frequent, and players have the chance to earn substantial prizes. The symbols on the reels include a mix of themed and non-themed icons, with the Wild symbol represented by the city of Asgard and the Scatter symbol featuring a winged-head mask which activates the bonus game and doubles wins. Asgard features several special functionalities that enhance gameplay and increase players' chances of winning, such as the Free Spin feature, stacked Wilds, and a Wild Rain feature that adds more Wild symbols to the reels. We recommend players try Asgard in demo mode before betting real money to discover all its secrets.

raw_translation.response:
Asgard: A Slot Game Review

General Information:
Software: Pragmatic Play
Reels: 5
Paylines: 25
Minimum Bet: €0.01
Maximum Bet: €125
Minimum Coin Value: €0.01
Maximum Coin Value: €0.5
Coins Per Line: 1-10
Return to Player (RTP): 96.48%
Volatility: Medium

Key Features:
This slot game by Pragmatic Play is inspired by the Norse legends, featuring gods and Vikings, and was launched online in June 2018. With its impressive and modern theme, it has been keeping up with recent Hollywood giant films which have brought the legendary populations of Northern Europe back to prominence, including those set in the imaginary realm of Asgard.
As for the graphics, they are absent of spectacular and realistic images, special effects, or 3D animations, which a topic like this would normally call for. Instead, the developer chose to utilize essential graphics reminiscent of the 80s, where characters look similar to those in Marvel comics. However, this slot is not particularly complicated. In fact, it is intuitive and easy to approach, making it ideal for those who are not experienced in slot games. True to other Pragmatic Play games, Asgard’s RTP is around the traditional 96%, while the volatility of this slot is medium, which means that winnings are frequently achievable, and players have a chance of obtaining valuable prizes.

Symbols, Wilds and Scatters in Asgard:
The symbols in this slot game, as almost always, can be classified as thematic or non-thematic. The non-thematic symbols are represented by playing cards from Jack to Ace, while the thematic ones are a real tribute to Norse legends. The main characters from these legends are featured on the reels, from Thor to Loki, from Odin to Freya, as regular symbols. The special symbols are the Wild (represented by the city of Asgard) and the Scatter or Bonus Symbol. The Wild serves as a wildcard, completing winning combos by replacing other symbols. The Scatter, in this instance a winged head mask, activates the bonus game and doubles your winnings.

Special Features:
Asgard presents several special features that enrich the gameplay and increase your chances of winning.
A Free Spin feature is activated randomly, giving access to bonus games.
Stacked Wilds: during regular gameplay, some symbols transform into stacked Wilds, increasing the potential for winning combinations.
Wild Rain: in this case, Wild symbols appear on the reels, increasing the chance of winning prizes.

Discover all the secrets of Asgard by playing in play-for-fun mode before betting real money!

response.headline: Graphics and Theme

This slot game by Pragmatic Play is inspired by the Norse legends, featuring gods and Vikings, and was launched online in June 2018. The symbols in this slot game, as almost always, can be classified as thematic or non-thematic. The non-thematic symbols are represented by playing cards from Jack to Ace, while the thematic ones are a real tribute to Norse legends. The main characters from these legends are featured on the reels, from Thor to Loki, from Odin to Freya, as regular symbols. The special symbols are the Wild (represented by the city of Asgard) and the Scatter or Bonus Symbol. The Wild serves as a wildcard, completing winning combos by replacing other symbols. The Scatter, in this instance a winged head mask, activates the bonus game and doubles your winnings.

The Scatter, in this instance a winged head mask, activates the bonus game and doubles your winnings.

Special Features:
Asgard presents several special features that enrich the gameplay and increase your chances of winning.

Stacked Wilds: during regular gameplay, some symbols transform into stacked Wilds, increasing the potential for winning combinations.
